item.description:
I will be making a reservation for 7:00 and we will meet by the hostess stand/bar area. I haven't been here in months and Im going through serious withdrawl not to mention I havent hosted an event in quite some time. I can't say enough good things about this place and Im sure the people who have joined me in the past agree with me. Bring your appetites.

http://www.meltingpot...

Severe weather will cancel - no need to risk life and limb

Contact me with any questions.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the lobby by the hostess stand / bar. My picture is accurate - look for the petite Asian woman keeping an eye on the door :) I will also send out my cell number the day of the event
item.why: Monday night special at the Framingham Melting Pot $30 per person includes: cheese fondue, salad, chocolate fondue and a choice of a glass of wine or specialty drink! Comes out to $37 including taxes and tip
item.name: The Melting Pot
